code: import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Pagination(_ref){var page=_ref.page,totalPages=_ref.totalPages,changePage=_ref.changePage;var changePageFunc=function changePageFunc(value){if(value>0&&value<=totalPages){changePage(value);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Showing page ",page,". out of ",totalPages,page===totalPages?"(last page)":"",page===1?"(first page)":""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:changePageFunc.bind(this,page-1),type:"button",children:"Prev"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:changePageFunc.bind(this,page+1),type:"button",children:"Next"})]});}export default Pagination;
